name: flora
description: MVP: A responsive app that enables a user to search a database of plants and create a collection of plants to refer back to later for various purposes determined by the user:     1. Login Page     2. Plants List Page     3. User Favorites Page     4. Details Page     5. About Us Page

scripts.recreate-tables: npm run drop-tables && npm run create-tables
scripts.setup-heroku: heroku addons:create heroku-postgresql:hobby-dev && heroku config:set PGSSLMODE=require
